BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots peas at the enemy
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向僵尸发射豌豆

Introduction.en: Peashooters are your first line of defence. They Shoot peas at attacking zombies
Introduction.zh: 豌豆射手是你的第一道防线。他们会向僵尸发射豌豆。

Chat.en: "What is it like being famous?"asked Peashooter while sipping his bottled water,"I can't talk right now, I'm finishing my merchandising deal. Hold my fir coat."
Chat.zh: “成为名人是什么感觉？”豌豆射手问了一句，抿了一口自己的瓶装水，“我现在没法说话，我正在完成我的销售项目，帮我拿一下我的毛皮大衣。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Gives you additional sun
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 提供额外的阳光

Introduction.en: Sunflowers are essential for you to produce extra sun. Try planting as many as you can!
Introduction.zh: 向日葵为你提供额外的阳光。种得越多越好！

Chat.en: After the release of her first major YouTuber video "Zombies On Your Lawn", Sunflower's YouTube channel has been bursting with fun. She is currently putting the final touches on her reality show TV pitch "Sunflower Thinks She Can Dance".
Chat.zh: 在发布了她的第一个油管视频 "Zombies On Your Lawn"，向日葵的油管频道充满了欢声笑语。她现在正在完善她的真人秀电视节目 "Sunflower Thinks She Can Dance" 的各种细节。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Blocks off zombies and protects your other plants
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 抵挡僵尸并保护身后的植物

Introduction.en: Wall-nuts have hard shells which you can use to protect your other plants.
Introduction.zh: 坚果墙利用自己坚硬的外壳保护其身后的植物。

Chat.en: Having retired from his days as a champion bowler in the Pro Leagues, Wall-nut is looking forward to a real challenge on the front lines of home defence. DEFENCE! DEFENCE!
Chat.zh: 自从退休，坚果墙不再在专业团队中作为一个冠军保龄球选手，他正憧憬着面对真正的挑战————在他的前院作为防线。守卫！守卫！

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Explodes on contact, but takes time to arm itself
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 种植一段时间后，在僵尸触碰时爆炸

Introduction.en: Potato Mines explode on contact, but they take time to arm. Plant them ahead of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 土豆地雷在被僵尸接触时自爆，但是他们需要时间做准备。将他们种在僵尸的前方。

DESCRIPTION.zh: 一次性使用，需要等待一段时间才能启动

Chat.en: Believe it or not, SPUDOW! did not happen overnight. Having been forced to try out new catchphrases and focus testing as many variation as possible (Tubular? Really?), Potato Mine weeded out the competition to stick with what he knows best.
Chat.zh: 爱信不信，昨晚一晚上没发出“轰隆————”声。他专注于尝试别的爆炸声，而且尝试了非常多种类（甚至有吸管的咕噜声？）土豆地雷最后不得不放弃对于突破现状的斗争，只能继续“轰隆————”了……

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Hurls cabbages over obstacles at the enemy
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向僵尸投掷能跨越障碍物的卷心菜

Introduction.en: Cabbage-pults hurl cabbages at the enemy.
Introduction.zh: 卷心菜投手向敌人投掷卷心菜。

Chat.en: Cabbage-pult received his doctorate in pulting from Harvest University. He knows a thing or two about launching hit way to the top. He also makes a mean soup.
Chat.zh: 卷心菜投手在哈丰大学的投掷专业获取了博士学位。他在投掷方面可谓登峰造极。他也懂得做出美味的热汤！

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Hits up to three targets in its lane, twice
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 击打本行的三个目标，各两次

Introduction.en: Bloomerangs can hit multiple targets in their lane, twice each coming and going!
Introduction.zh: 回旋镖射手可以每次击打本行的多个目标，回旋镖来回都能造成伤害！

Chat.en: As the first new member to your home defence team, Bloomerang enjoys long walkabouts with his friends, Koala Bear, and listening to his Bob Barley albums out back.
Chat.zh: 由于他是植物队列里的第一位稀客，回旋镖射手非常享受与他的朋友考拉散步，并在回来的时候听鲍勃·大麦的专辑。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Freezes zombies that step on it, and extinguishes flames
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 冻结接触到的僵尸，并熄灭火炬

Introduction.en: Iceberg Lettuces freezes a zombie when stepped on.
Introduction.zh: 冰冻生菜会冻结一只踩中他的僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.zh: 接触时爆裂，一段时间内冻结一只僵尸

Chat.en: Don't get lost staring into Iceberg's adoably cute eyes. If you do, it will be your last step... but only if you're a zombie.
Chat.zh: 不要因为盯着他过分可爱的双眼而迷失自我。不然的话你将没法迈出下一步……除非你不是一只僵尸。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Rapidly punches enemies ahead or behind
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 快速击打身前或身后的敌人

Introduction.en: Bonk Choys rapidly punch nearby enemies that are ahead or behind them.
Introduction.zh: 菜问快速击打身前或身后的敌人。

DESCRIPTION.zh: 能击打身前和身后的敌人

Chat.en: A freelance dentist on the side, he's offering a special this month - he'll knock two of your teeth out of the price of one!
Chat.zh: 菜问还是一位兼职牙医，这个月他还端上了一道“特色菜”————你能用拔掉一颗牙齿的价钱，让他给你敲掉两颗牙！

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots two peas at the enemy
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向敌人发射两颗豌豆

Introduction.en: Repeaters fire two peas at one time.
Introduction.zh: 双重射手每次发射两颗豌豆。

Chat.en: "Everyone always askes me if we've met before," says Repeater."Everyone always asks me if we've met before. Wait, did I just say that?"
Chat.zh: “大家见到我总是问我们是不是见过，”双重射手说，“大家见到我总是问我们是不是见过。等等，这句话是不是说了两遍？”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Fire 4 peas at a time
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向敌人发射 4 颗豌豆，概率释放叶绿素效果

Introduction.en: Mega Gatling Peas fire 4 peas at one time.
Introduction.zh: 超级机枪豌豆射手每次发射 4 颗豌豆。

DESCRIPTION.en: upgrades to 5x firing speed if Plant Fooded
DESCRIPTION.zh: 使用叶绿素后，升级成为5倍射速

DESCRIPTION.en: has chance to randomly Plant Food himself
DESCRIPTION.zh: 有概率自己发动叶绿素效果

Chat.en: "I used to be an upgrade," says Mega Gatling Pea with uncharacteristic shyness."Now I'm my own plant, with my own ambitions, dreams and gym club memberships!"
Chat.zh: “我曾经是某株植物的升级款，”超级机枪豌豆非常害羞地说，“但是我现在是一株独立的植物了,我有自己的志向、梦想，还有健身房会员！”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots spore projectiles at the zombies, but hides when they get too close
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向僵尸发射子弹，但是当僵尸靠近时躲避

Introduction.en: A timid mushroom that shoots spore projectiles at zombies in its lane, but hides when they get too close.
Introduction.zh: 向僵尸发射孢子的胆小的蘑菇，当僵尸靠近身边时躲避起来。

DESCRIPTION.en: stops attacking when zombies appears around
DESCRIPTION.zh: 有僵尸在附近时停止攻击

Chat.en: "How did I get talked into this? I wish I was at home."
Chat.zh: “我当初为什么会被说服站在这里？我现在只想回家啊！”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots fumes that can damage all zombies in an area
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向范围内的所有僵尸发射孢子攻击

Introduction.en: Fume-shrooms shoot fumes that damage all zombies in an area.
Introduction.zh: 大喷菇向范围内所有僵尸发射孢子攻击。

Chat.en: "I think of myself as a pretty confident shroom and an all-around fungi,"says Fume-shroom."But sometimes, when I'm eating Plant Food, I hear them chuckling. I hear them calling me 'Balloon-shroom'. I don't think they know how much that hurts."
Chat.zh: “我觉得自己是一只很自信而且全能型的大蘑菇，”大喷菇说，“但是有时候我释放叶绿素效果时听到别人偷笑，说我是‘气球菇’……我猜他们根本不知道这话多么伤人。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Plant it on a grave to remove the grave
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 种植在墓碑上并移除这块墓碑

Introduction.en: Grave Busters consume graves they're planted on.
Introduction.zh: 将噬碑藤种在墓碑上，他们会啃食掉这块墓碑。

DESCRIPTION.en: single use, must be planted on graves
DESCRIPTION.zh: 一次性使用，必须种植在墓碑上

Chat.en: He may appear spiky or ill-tempered, but Grave Buster just wants to give you a big hug. Unless you're a puppy. He's terrified of those.
Chat.zh: 他可能看上去凶巴巴坏脾气，但是噬碑藤只是想要给你一个大大的拥抱。除非你是一只小狗，他很害怕小狗！

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Surrounds and protects
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 保护本格的其他植物

Introduction.en: Pumpkins can be planted on top of other plants to provide a tough additional layer of armor.
Introduction.zh: 南瓜头可以被种植在其他植物的身上，作为保护他们的铠甲。

Chat.en: Pumpkin may be a hollowed-out shell, but he still has a rich inner life filled with feelings, fantasies and suprisingly disappointing opinions.
Chat.zh: 南瓜头可能只是一颗被掏空的南瓜壳，但是他的内心仍然充满了感情、幻想以及让人非常失望的各种点子。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Boosts Appease-mint plants
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 加强本格的豌豆类植物和豌豆家族植物

Introduction.en: Pea Vines planted on top of Appease-mint Family plants provide a significant damage boost to those plants.
Introduction.zh: 为豌豆家族植物套上豌豆藤蔓，他们会得到显著的伤害增益。

Chat.en: Pea Vine boosts Appease-mint Family plants, and he himself is an Appease-mint Family plant, so therefore... hang on... don't tell me... I can do this. I said DON'T TELL ME.
Chat.zh: 豌豆藤蔓加强豌豆家族植物，而他自己也是豌豆家族的植物，所以……因此……等等……先别告诉我……我记得是啥！我说了不要告诉我！

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Allows un-flyable plants to be planted in sky
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 可以在空中种植不能飞行的植物

Introduction.en: Floawer Pots let you plant un-flyable plants on top of them.
Introduction.zh: 飞天花盆允许你在天上或潮水上种植不会飞的植物。

DESCRIPTION.en: carries plants that aren't able to fly

Chat.en: Floawer Pot is actually from the future for sure, but not from your roof in the past. "You asked why? Feed me a Plant Food, I'd tell ya! " He says.
Chat.zh: 飞天花盆实际上当然来自未来，而不是从以前你家的屋顶上。“你问为什么？喂我一颗叶绿素我就告诉你！”他说。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots flaming peas and warms nearby plants
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 发射火焰豌豆，并冰释身边的植物

Introduction.en: Fire Peashooters shoot flaming peas down the lane.
Introduction.zh: 火焰豌豆向本行发射火焰豌豆。

Chat.en: Fire Peashooter knows that what she does looks exciting. But working with an open flame is serious and, more importantly, dangerous business. That's why, in her spare time, she talks to children about the importance of fire safety. "I'm a trained professional," she explains. "Don't try this at home, kids."
Chat.zh: 火焰豌豆射手很清楚她看上去多么的酷炫。但是身上燃着火焰战斗是一件十分严肃，而且关键是很危险的行为。因此，在她闲时经常告诫孩子们关于消防安全的事情。“我是接受过训练的，非常专业，”她解释道，“千万不要在家自己尝试，孩子们。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots three peas in three lanes
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向三行发射豌豆

Introduction.en: Threepeaters shoot peas in three lanes.
Introduction.zh: 三线射手向三行发射豌豆。

Chat.en: Threepeater loves playing multiplayer in video games, but split-screen never works out because the left head always cheats.
Chat.zh: 三线射手喜欢在电子游戏中玩多人模式，但是就算分成三个屏幕也没有用，左边那个家伙总喜欢作弊偷看。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots heavy stunning peas
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 发射重型豌豆

Introduction.en: Primal Peashooters shoot heavy peas with a brief stun at zombies.
Introduction.zh: 原始豌豆射手发射沉重的大豌豆，对僵尸造成短暂的眩晕。

DESCRIPTION.en: primal peas occasionally knock zombies back
DESCRIPTION.zh: 沉重的豌豆有时能击退僵尸一段距离

Chat.en: Primal Peashooter may be primitive, but that doesn't stop him from enrolling and excelling in several software development correspondence courses.
Chat.zh: 尽管原始豌豆可能很原始，但是他仍然能涉猎并精通好几门软件开发的相关课程。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots along the diagonal, up to four directions at a time
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向四个对角方向发射子弹

Introduction.en: Rotobagas shoot projectiles along the four diagonals, in each direction that has a target.
Introduction.zh: 旋转芜菁向四个对角方向发射子弹

Chat.en: Sometimes Rotobaga hears the other plants gossiping about each other. "Did you notice that so-and-so has been putting on weight?" they might say. Or, "I hear that so-and-so is dating so-and-so. Can you believe it?" But Rotobaga isn't the kind of plant to engage in idle gossiping. She's not interested in talking about anyone behind their leaves. She does her best to rise above it.
Chat.zh: 有时候旋转芜菁会听到其他植物说别人闲话。比如说，“你发现那个谁谁谁又增重了吗？”又比如，“我听说谁谁谁和谁谁谁约上了呢。你能相信嘛？哈哈。”但是旋转芜菁不是那种喜欢参与闲聊的植物，她对在别人叶后说闲话不感兴趣。因此她总是尽可能“上升”到别的话题。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Attacks farthest left target in any lane
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向场地最左侧目标发动攻击

Introduction.en: Homing Thistles fire seeking shots at targets that are the closest to home.
Introduction.zh: 导向蓟会向离家最近的目标发射追踪子弹。

Chat.en: Don't even think about trying to pull one over on Homing Thistle. He's got a bead on you. He sees right through your facade. It's like he has a laser beam... aimed at your soul.
Chat.zh: 别想着能欺骗导向蓟。他能一眼把你看穿，穿过你表露的假象，像是一道雷射光，精准地瞄着你的灵魂！

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots stars in 5 directions
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向五个方向发射星星

Introduction.en: Starfruits shoot stars in 5 directions.
Introduction.zh: 星星果会向五个方向发射星星子弹。

Chat.en: Just a small town fruit that travelled to the big city and found his way to the future. His favorite modes of transportation: conveyor belts, hoverboards, and rockets. WEEEEE!
Chat.zh: 只是一只乡下来的小小的水果，四处游荡，到了大城市，甚至找到了通向未来的路。他最喜欢的交通方式是：传送带、悬浮滑板，还有火箭。哇呼呼呼呼！

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots 5 stars along the lanes at a time
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 沿五行发射星星

Introduction.en: Shooting Starfruits shoot stars in 5 lanes.
Introduction.zh: 流星果会沿着五个行发射星星子弹。

Chat.en: When you see a Shooting Starfruit, make a wish, any wish! Any wish that involves takin' down Zombies, that is.
Chat.zh: 当你遇见一只流星果，许愿，任何愿望！只要是关于打倒僵尸的愿望，他都会为你实现的！

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Let you plant non-aquatic plants on top of it
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 允许在水面上种植非两栖植物

Introduction.en: Lily Pads let you plant non-aquatic plants on top of them.
Introduction.zh: 你可以种植非水生植物在莲叶上

DESCRIPTION.en: can also be planted under non-aquatic plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 也可以种植在非水生植物的下方

Chat.en: Not many people know this, but Lily Pad absolutely loves square dancing. There he is, a circular plant gliding across the dance floor making squares. He loves how it pushes his boundaries and really makes him outside the sphere.
Chat.zh: 没多少人知道，莲叶真的很喜欢跳方块舞，我是指，在一个方块里跳舞。你看他又开始了，那株圆形的植物在方格舞池上滑行，把他自己变成方形。他很喜欢被方框压着边缘的感觉，能让他感到脱离了“单调的圈子”。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Gives more sun over time
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 随着生长产出更多的阳光

Introduction.en: Sun-shrooms give small suns at first, then normal suns, and finally large suns.
Introduction.zh: 阳光菇一开始提供小阳光，然后提供普通阳光，最后提供大阳光。

Chat.en: Oh sure, Sun-shroom is known for his ever-present grin and sunny disposition. But truth be told, even he has his dark days. It ain't easy keeping things light when you live in the shadow.
Chat.zh: 哦当然，阳光菇的性格可常常是出了名的积极阳光。但是实话说，即使是他也有不顺心的日子。生活在黑暗之中还能一直保持阳光可不是件容易的事。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Gives twice as much as a sunflower
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 生产比向日葵更多的阳光

Introduction.en: Twin Sunflowers give twice as much sun as a normal sunflower.
Introduction.zh: 双胞向日葵提供向日葵两倍的阳光。

Chat.en: Twin Sunflower's super-chic line of ultra-expensive sunglasses has been a huge hit wherever she goes. Due to this she has been unable to travel without being swarmed by the Poppyrazzi.
Chat.zh: 双胞向日葵那副超级时尚又无比昂贵的墨镜让她不论在哪都像个大明星。因此她不论去到哪里都会被“枸籽队”簇拥。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Launches 3 explosive seed pod projectiles at zombies across 3 adjacent lanes
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向三行的僵尸投掷爆裂子弹

Introduction.en: Dragon Bruits launch 3 explosive seed pod projectiles at zombies across 3 adjacent lanes. When destroyed, Dragon Bruits will split into 3 smaller plants.
Introduction.zh: 暴君火龙果会向三相邻行的敌人发射三颗爆炸性子弹。被击败后，会分裂成三株小暴君火龙果。

DESCRIPTION.en: powered Dragon Bruits apply poison to the projectiles
DESCRIPTION.zh: 暗影形态的暴君火龙果会使子弹带毒

Chat.en: While each head of Dragon Bruit doesn't have their own name, they do each have their own unique personality. The Center head is the calm, rational one. While Lefty is a bit reserved and shy. Righty is... Well... always right.
Chat.zh: 尽管暴君火龙果的三颗头并没有各自的名字，他们却有着独特的性格。中间的那个冷静理性，左边的内敛害羞，右边的那个总是护“佑”着大家。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Gives suns and powers up adjacent shadow plants
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 生产阳光并强化周围的暗影植物

Introduction.en: Moonflowers radiate a glow that powers up adjacent shadow plant.
Introduction.zh: 月光花释放可以使周围暗影植物进入暗影状态的月光。

DESCRIPTION.en: emits sun as well as additional sun for each adjacent shadow plant up to four
DESCRIPTION.zh: 随着身边暗影植物增多而增多，四株（包括自己）时最多

Chat.en: Moonflower is a fierce collaborator. She'll collaborate with anything. She'd collaborate with a table if she could.
Chat.zh: 月光花非常喜欢合作。她可以和任何事物合作。如果可以的话，她甚至能和一张桌子合作。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots frozen peas that damage and slow zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向僵尸发射寒冰子弹

Introduction.en: Snow Peas fire frozen peas making it hard for zombies to advance.
Introduction.zh: 寒冰射手发射寒冰子弹，能使僵尸前进变得缓慢。

DESCRIPTION.en: chills and damages zombie on impact
DESCRIPTION.zh: 子弹会对僵尸造成伤害并冰冻

DESCRIPTION.en: chills closely following zombies with no damage
DESCRIPTION.zh: 子弹爆裂时对附近僵尸施加冰冻效果

Chat.en: As a professional table tennis player, in the off-season he also enjoys skiing, playing the bongos, and spelunking.
Chat.zh: 作为专业的乒乓球运动员，休赛期间他还会去滑翔，打手鼓，甚至是探洞穴。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Zaps several chickens or zombies per strike
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 电击连续的几只僵尸或鸡

Introduction.en: Lightning Reeds shoot lightning at the nearest zombie up to one lane away. The bolt will then arc and hit other zombies.
Introduction.zh: 闪电芦苇对相邻行最近的目标发射闪电，击中时电弧会伤害周围的僵尸。

Chat.en: This may come as a shock, but Lightning Reed has a serious passion for ham radio. His call sign is El3ctric H1ccup. You can tune in every Tuesday to hear him read the classics to elderly plants. This week: Seeds and Sensibility.
Chat.zh: 令人大惊的是，闪电芦苇热衷于业余广播。他呼号“闪嗝”。你能在每周二在他的频道听到他读名著给老植物们听。本周内容：播种和感性。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Flings corn kernels and butter at zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向僵尸投掷黄油和玉米粒

Introduction.en: Kernel-pults fling corn kernels and butter at zombies.
Introduction.zh: 玉米投手向僵尸投掷玉米粒和黄油。

Chat.en: While working as an usher at the local movieplex, he saw "Fried Green Tomatoes" and found his higher calling. He packed up his husks, his kernels, his butter, and enlisted.
Chat.zh: 在电影院当招待员时，他看了《油炸绿西红柿》并找到了更长远的目标。于是他把他的玉米壳、玉米粒、黄油打包起来后参与了战斗。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Conjures meteor strikes from the sky that leaves molten tiles
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 从空中召唤能融化地面的流星

Introduction.en: Meteor Flower conjures meteor strikes from the sky that leave molten tiles.
Introduction.zh: 流星花从天上召唤流星，砸地时留下岩浆。

Chat.en: "Out of this world molten mayhem! But first... coffee!!"
Chat.zh: “熔融的骚乱啊，滚出这个世界！但是在此之前……喝口咖啡！！”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Bounces zombies back and into nearby water
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 将僵尸向右侧弹开，或弹进周围的水里

Introduction.en: Spring Beans bounce back zombies that get too close. Will bounce them into water if nearby.
Introduction.zh: 弹簧豆会将接触的僵尸往回弹。当附近有水时，将他们弹进水里。

DESCRIPTION.en: pushes zombies back, or into water
DESCRIPTION.zh: 将僵尸弹回，或弹进水里

Chat.en: He's the strong, silent type and little is known about Spring Bean. What is known though: his fan club is a million followers strong. And the ladies love him.
Chat.zh: 他人狠话不多，而且很神秘。大家也只知道：他的粉丝体量高达百万，更是受到女孩子们的欢迎。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Protects plants from falling threats
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 保护植物免受来自空中的威胁

Introduction.en: Umbrella Leaves protect plants from falling threats.
Introduction.zh: 伞叶保护植物免受来自空中的威胁。

DESCRIPTION.en: pushes zombies fell from sky to the right
DESCRIPTION.zh: 将从空而降的僵尸弹回到最右边

Chat.en: She's not very frond of getting wet.
Chat.zh: 她不是很喜欢被“霖”湿。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Does heavy damage to groups of zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 对一群僵尸造成大量伤害

Introduction.en: Melon-pults do heavy damage to groups of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 西瓜投手会对成群的僵尸造成大量伤害。

Chat.en: "Everyone says my head looks like a melon," said the middle child of the Pult-family, "and they would be right." Don't ask him if he's seedless or not though, it offends him and frankly it's none of your business.
Chat.zh: “很多人说我的头像个西瓜，”投手家族的老二说，“而且被他们说中了。”别问他是不是无籽的，这对他来说很冒犯，而且这不关你事。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Does heavy damage and slows groups of zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 对一群僵尸造成大量伤害并减速

Introduction.en: Melon-pults do heavy damage and slow to groups of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 西瓜投手会对成群的僵尸造成大量伤害，并使他们减速。

Chat.en: You may recognize Winter Melon's voice from such incredible documentaries as "It's Cold Up Here","Ice Bingo", and "Surfin' Swedes".
Chat.zh: 你可以在一些有名的文献里看读出冰西瓜的写作腔调，比如《高处不胜寒》《冰果》以及《冲浪的甘蓝》。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Blows away all flying and floating zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 吹飞所有的飞行僵尸

Introduction.en: Blovers blow away all zombies in the air.
Introduction.zh: 三叶草会吹飞空中的所有僵尸。

Chat.en: The luckiest stunt clover around, Blover is the most recent recipient of the Stunty Award. You can see his work in "Bulb Fiction," "Rooty", and "Finding Flower". He also teaches stunt class on Tuesdays at the community center.
Chat.zh: 作为最幸运的特技三叶草，三叶草也是特技奖的获得者。你可以在“球茎小说”、“寻根”和“寻花”中看到他的作品。他还每周二在社区中心教特技课。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Breaks 1 rolling object, hurts zombies that step on it
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 对走过的僵尸造成伤害，并破坏 1 个滚动的物体

Introduction.en: Spikeweeds destroy one rolling zombie and hurt any zombies that step on them.
Introduction.zh: 地刺摧毁一滚动前行的目标，并且对经过的僵尸造成伤害。

DESCRIPTION.zh: 会被滚动前行的僵尸摧毁

Chat.en: Although Spikeweed grew up on the seedy side of town, his acupuncture business has been blooming.
Chat.zh: 尽管地刺在村里的播种地长大，他的针灸事业也在蓬勃发展。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Breaks 3 rolling object, hurts zombies that step on it
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 对走过的僵尸造成伤害，并破坏 3 个滚动的物体

Introduction.en: Spikerocks destroy multiple rolling zombies and damage zombies that walk over them.
Introduction.zh: 钢地刺摧毁多个滚动前行的目标，并且对经过的僵尸造成伤害。

DESCRIPTION.en: can take three hits from rolling zombies
DESCRIPTION.zh: 能承受滚动前行的僵尸三次打击

Chat.en: Being the most metal plant, Spikerock has decided to hold his ultimate metal plant concert at Madison Rock Garden. Tickets have been sold out for many harvests.
Chat.zh: 作为最具金属性的植物，钢地刺打算在麦迪生石头花园举办他的终极重金属音乐节。票已经售罄了好几个丰收季了。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Devours 2 zombies, then chews on each for a while
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 吃掉僵尸，并花费时间消化

Introduction.en: Chompers can devour 2 zombies whole, but they are vulnerable while chewing.
Introduction.zh: 大嘴花可以完整地吃掉两只僵尸，但是他们在咀嚼时很脆弱。

Chat.en: Everyone appreciates what Chomper does. His appetite has saved them on numerous occasions. But truth be told, Chomper's friends think that eating zombies is gross. And his breath! No one has the heart to tell him, and he never gets the hint when you offer him a mint.
Chat.zh: 大家都因大嘴花的事迹而钦佩他。他奇特的口味三番两次地拯救了他们。但是说实话，大嘴花的朋友们觉得吃僵尸很恶心。而且他口气很重！但是大家都不愿意告诉他这一点，即使送他一颗薄荷糖也不能让他意识到这一点。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Tap to freeze all zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 点击冻结所有的僵尸

Introduction.en: Click on Ice Shrooms to freeze and chill all zombies on the lawn.
Introduction.zh: 点击寒冰菇冻结全屏的僵尸，此后需要一段时间恢复。

DESCRIPTION.en: tap to freeze all zombies on the lawn
emits cold mists that chill zombies
DESCRIPTION.zh: 释放能令僵尸减速的冰雾

DESCRIPTION.en: buffs nearby Winter-mint plants and freezes attacking zombies if Plant Fooded
DESCRIPTION.zh: 施加叶绿素后，强化周围的寒冰家族植物，并冻结啃食他的僵尸

Chat.en: His coldness can make even flames feel chilly; his gaze is like an icicle in winter, just one look can make you feel the bone-chilling coldness. If you ask him to tell a joke, even the air might freeze. That's why he's popular during summer.
Chat.zh: 他的冷酷程度可以让火焰都能感到寒冷。他的眼神就像是冬天的冰柱，看一眼就能让你感觉到透进骨子里的寒冷。如果你要他讲一个笑话，可能连空气都能冷得凝固。因此，他在夏天特别受欢迎。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Quick-planting wall that blocks off zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 冷却时间更短的坚果墙

Introduction.en: Primal Wall-nuts cost a bit more than typical Wall-nuts, but they can be planted much more quickly.
Introduction.zh: 原始坚果墙比普通坚果墙需要更多阳光，但是能被更快地种植。

Chat.en: "Grunt," explains Primal Wall-nut. "Grunt oog grunt-grunt," he goes on to say. "Ook-urg grunty grunt grunt," he concludes. A nut of many opinions, is Primal Wall-nut.
Chat.zh: “呼噜”，原始坚果墙解释着。“呼噜唔，呼噜呼噜，”他继续说道。“哦库噜呼噜呼噜，”他总结道。一个点子很多的坚果，就是原始坚果墙。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Butters attacking zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向啃食她的僵尸投掷黄油

Introduction.en: Buttercup butters butter onto attacking zombies, stunning them with butter. Butter!
Introduction.zh: 黄油毛茛向啃食她的僵尸投掷黄油，用黄油控制住他们。全是黄油！

DESCRIPTION.zh: 黄油溅到地上，使碰到的僵尸沾上黄油

Chat.en: Buttercup's sweet as can be, but she packs a wallop! "I'm not cheap," she says, referring to her flat 25 sun cost. "I'm reasonable."
Chat.zh: 黄油毛茛非常甜美，但是她也会发脾气！“我才不是便宜货，”她指着自己25阳光的平庸价格说道，“这个价格合情合理。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Click on banana, then a tile, to launch explosive banana
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 点击后，选择一格发射爆炸香蕉子弹

Introduction.en: Banana Launchers can fire explosive bananas at any tile on the lawn.
Introduction.zh: 香蕉火箭炮能向场内任意一格发射一枚爆炸性香蕉子弹。

DESCRIPTION.en: tap to arm, tap on target tile to fire
DESCRIPTION.zh: 点击瞄准，再点击目标格子发射

DESCRIPTION.en: on impact, explodes in small area

Chat.en: It's important to avoid stereotyping as much as possible. Stereotypes are often flat-out wrong. And also hurtful. But honestly ... Banana Launcher is TOTALLY bananas.
Chat.zh: 最好是消除刻板印象，刻板印象普遍是错误的，而且很伤人。但是实话实说，香蕉火箭炮完全就是个香蕉。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Launches chilling blasts
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 发射寒冰导弹

Introduction.en: Missile Toes launch cold blasts that damage, chill and slow zombies.
Introduction.zh: 榭寄冰仙子发射寒冰子弹，对僵尸造成伤害并减速。

DESCRIPTION.en: tap to arm, tap on target tile to fire
DESCRIPTION.zh: 点击瞄准，再点击目标格子发射

DESCRIPTION.en: on impact, explodes in small area

Chat.en: While she is called Missile Toe, Missile Toe has no toes and, properly speaking, lacks missiles. How'd she get her name? Nepotism! Pure favoritism.
Chat.zh: 榭寄冰仙子也被叫做指尖火箭炮，尽管她没有手指头，准确来讲，她也没有火箭炮。那么她为什么会被这么称呼？裙带关系！比起另一个火箭炮，大家更喜欢她罢了。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Blows up all zombies in a medium area
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 爆炸并对范围内僵尸造成伤害

Introduction.en: Cherry Bombs can blow up all zombies in an area. They have a short fuse so plant them near zombies.
Introduction.zh: 樱桃炸弹会爆炸并对范围内所有僵尸造成伤害。他们会立刻爆炸，将他们种在僵尸附近。

Chat.en: The Cherry Bomb Brothers attempted to start their own band. "We tried to figure out what the sound would be, but we kept explodonating speakers, stages, fans, and of course, zombies. Look for our LP next year."
Chat.zh: 樱桃炸弹兄弟尝试过建立他们自己的乐队。“我们尽力去搞清楚应该发出什么样的音色，但是我们一直炸坏音响，炸烂舞台，炸跑粉丝，当然也炸死了僵尸。希望明年还能找到我们的合伙人。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Blows up all zombies in a huge area
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 爆炸并对巨大范围内僵尸造成伤害

Introduction.en: Doom Shrooms can blow up all zombies in a huge area. Leaving a crackled tile.
Introduction.zh: 毁灭菇会爆炸并对范围内所有僵尸造成伤害，砸碎所在的格子，一段时间内无法种植植物。

Chat.en: "Leave me far from what is valuable for you. How gentle I was to have told you that!"
Chat.zh: “别让我离你珍视的东西太近了，把这件事告诉你，我真是太温柔了。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Crushes zombies in the lane under its girthy jellified mass
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 碾压一行的僵尸

Introduction.en: Instant plant that crushes zombies in the lane under its girthy jellified mass. Leaves behind a pool of acidic goo that both slows and damages zombies when a zombie is crushed.
Introduction.zh: 立刻从本行左侧冲出，利用沉重的黏冻碾压一整行的僵尸。击败僵尸时留下一块能对僵尸造成伤害的果冻。

Chat.en: Cran Jelly is more than capable of changing into any other shapes. Cubes. Pyramids Cones. Icosahedron. It can do it all. But few shapes are as structurally strong or offer as much zombie crushing power as the cylinder. Not to mention, it lets him go really fast.
Chat.zh: 果冻蔓越莓可不仅仅会变成各种各样的形状。方块，四棱锥，二十面体，他都能做到。但是几乎没有别的形状比圆柱体更坚固，更能摧毁僵尸。更别说，圆柱让他跑得更快！

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Launches an explosive seed pod projectile at zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向僵尸投掷爆裂子弹

Introduction.en: Baby Dragon Bruits launch explosive seed pod projectiles at zombies.
Introduction.zh: 小暴君火龙果向僵尸投掷爆裂子弹。

DESCRIPTION.en: powered Baby Dragon Bruits apply poison to the projectiles
DESCRIPTION.zh: 暗影形态的暴君火龙果会使子弹带毒

Chat.en: As one of the heads from a Dragon Bruit, as mentioned, you can never find out his personality.
Chat.zh: 他是暴君火龙果留下的一颗头，如前文，你永远不会知道他是什么性格。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Turns peas into fireballs and does lanewide damage on defeat
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 点燃经过的豌豆，死亡时对整行造成伤害

Introduction.en: Torchwoods turn peas that pass through them into fireballs that deal twice as much damage. They also deal close damage as well as lanewide flame damage on defeat.
Introduction.zh: 火炬树桩将经过的豌豆点燃，造成双倍伤害。他们也会对靠近的僵尸造成伤害，死亡时会在燃烧一整行的僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.zh: 对靠近的僵尸造成伤害

DESCRIPTION.en: does lane wide flame damage when destroyed
DESCRIPTION.zh: 死亡时对整行僵尸造成燃烧伤害

Chat.en: Torchwood and Snapdragon have become fast friends. They like to hang out at either the Tiki Lounge or the Renaissance Faire.
Chat.zh: 火炬树桩和火龙草形影不离。他们不是去提基酒馆，就是去学习复兴文化。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Destroys an entire lane of zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 燃烧摧毁一整行的僵尸

Introduction.en: Jalapenos destroy an entire lane of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 火爆辣椒摧毁一整行的僵尸。

Chat.en: This jalapeno is one spicy character by day and The Macramé Vigilante by night. You might be wondering what his secret weapons is... it's knots.
Chat.zh: 白天他还是一个暴躁的家伙，晚上就成为了一个细心的花边编织手。你可能好奇他的秘密武器是什么……是打结。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Short-range shooter, lasts for a limited time
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 射程短，并且一段时间后消失

Introduction.en: Puff-shrooms are short-range shooters that last for a limited time.
Introduction.zh: 小喷菇射程短，一段时间后消失。

Chat.en: Puff-shroom is hip to all the latest social networks. He loves to surf Sporebook, FungusedIn and ShroomstaGram. But he sometimes misses the simple camaraderie of a good ol' fashioned Lawn Area Network party.
Chat.zh: 小喷菇熟知各种最新的社交网络平台。他喜欢刷"Sporebook""FungusedIn"以及"ShroomstaGram"。但他有时候怀念在草坪上和大家一起上网时那种简简单单的陪伴。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots in 8 directions
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 攻击自身为中心的范围内的僵尸

Introduction.en: Gloom Vines power individual shadow plants and shoot zombie-damaging gloom in eight directions.
Introduction.zh: 忧郁藤蔓使本格的暗影植物进入暗影状态。同时能向八个方向发射孢子，对僵尸造成伤害。

Chat.en: Gloom Vine's gloomy exterior shouldn't be seen as implying a gloomy interior. His interior is gloomy, but for complicated personal reasons that go way back.
Chat.zh: 忧郁藤蔓那幽暗的外观并不暗示他幽暗的内心。虽说他的内心确实很幽暗，但那是长久以来的个人原因导致的。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Drains HP from surrounding zombies for a few seconds
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 一段时间内吸收周围僵尸的血量

Introduction.en: Vamporcinis are defensive plants that drain HP from surrounding zombies for a few seconds.
Introduction.zh: 吸血牛肝菌是从周围的僵尸吸取血量以强化自身的防御型植物。

DESCRIPTION.en: HP from zombies becomes her own toughness
DESCRIPTION.zh: 从僵尸吸取的血量用于增加自身血量

Chat.en: "Zombie blood Is Like Pizza, in that even when It's Bad It's Good!" - Vamporcini... probably
Chat.zh: “僵尸的血就像是披萨，就算变质了也照样美味！”————吸血牛肝菌（……可能吧）

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Explodes and does area damage
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 爆炸范围更大的土豆地雷

Introduction.en: Primal Potato Mines cost more than regular Potato Mines, but they arm more quickly and do damage over a larger area.
Introduction.zh: 原始土豆地雷比普通的土豆地雷消耗更多的阳光，但是他们更快准备完毕，并且造成伤害的范围更广。

DESCRIPTION.zh: 一次性使用，需要等待一段时间才能启动

Chat.en: Primal Potato Mine doesn't consider himself to be primal. As far as he's concerned he's state-of-the-art. And who knows? Maybe he is.
Chat.zh: 原始土豆地雷并不觉得自己很原始，相反他认为自己是最先进的。谁知道呢？也许他真是。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Fires a penetrating thorn, hides for ground damage
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 射出穿透性的刺，僵尸靠近时缩进地里攻击

Introduction.en: Cactus fires a penetrating thorn that can damage multiple enemies! Hides underground when zombies are close. Can pop balloon zombies.
Introduction.zh: 仙人掌发射能穿透击打多个目标的刺！在僵尸靠近时躲在地下。能直接扎破气球僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: hides and does ground damage when zombies are near
DESCRIPTION.zh: 躲在地下时会对经过的僵尸造成伤害

Chat.en: Things have really changed for Cactus lately. Book deals, movies, truck show appearances... she's just trying to focus on staying humble and launching thorns like always.
Chat.zh: 仙人掌最近真的变了好多。买书、电影、卡车展……她现在只想努力保持低调，像以往一样发射一些刺。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Creates one Plant Food for use
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 产生一个叶绿素

Introduction.en: Power Lilies create one Plant Food out of thin air.
Introduction.zh: 能量花凭空变出一颗叶绿素。

Chat.en: From seedling to sapling, to full grown foliage, Power Lily's experience as a life coach has shown her the best way to empower and support plants everywhere.
Chat.zh: 从种子到树苗，再到枝繁叶茂，能量花作为生命导师的经验足以成为她滋养其他植物的最好资本。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Tap on the cannon to fire an explosive coconut
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 点击发射一颗爆炸性椰子炮弹

Introduction.en: Coconut Cannons fire down a single lane, causing a medium explosion on impact.
Introduction.zh: 椰子加农炮沿着本行发射，炸裂时造成范围性伤害。

DESCRIPTION.en: on impact, explodes in medium area
DESCRIPTION.zh: 击中目标时，在中等范围内爆炸

Chat.en: Sure, he's a hairy old man, but Coconut Cannon can still fire on all cylinders. The reason he's so hairy: he's in-between waxings.
Chat.zh: 当然他已经是个长发老人，但是椰子加农炮仍然能用各种枪管发射。他之所以这么多毛发，是因为他还在接受蜜蜡除毛服务。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Plant multiple times on the same spot to multiply damage
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 多次重叠种植提高攻击力

Introduction.en: Pea Pods can be planted in the same space for up to 5 times the destruction.
Introduction.zh: 在同一格种植豌豆荚，能让他们的攻击力提升到至多 5 倍。

DESCRIPTION.en: increases rate of fire with multiple plantings
DESCRIPTION.zh: 多次种植，提高单次发射豌豆数量

Chat.en: Having studied Quantum Spatial Mechanics in Clown College, Pea Pod has been amusing families of all ages.
Chat.zh: 自从毕业于职业小丑学院的空间量子力学专业，豌豆荚就一直在取悦家里的老小。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Breaths fire in an area in front of it
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向身前区域吐息

Introduction.en: Snapdragons breathe fire that causes damage in 6 adjacent tiles.
Introduction.zh: 火龙草向毗邻的 6 格吐出有伤害的火焰。

DESCRIPTION.en: damages all zombies in the 6 tiles in front of it
DESCRIPTION.zh: 对身前 6 个格子内的所有僵尸造成伤害

Chat.en: Although the most powerful dragon in the plant kingdom, he still dreams of wings and seeing the world beneath him.
Chat.zh: 就算他是植物王国里最强大的一条龙，他仍然希望有一对翅膀，俯瞰整个世界。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots 4 peas at a time
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向敌人发射 4 颗豌豆

Introduction.en: Gatling Peas fire 4 peas at one time at a shorter shooting rate.
Introduction.zh: 机枪射手每次发射 4 豌豆，并且拥有更高的射速。

Chat.en: During a certain explosion at a research center, a reed was thunderstruck and became Lightning Reed. Meanwhile, a Peashooter on a gatling was also zapped, that's the origin of our new superhero, Gatling Pea.
Chat.zh: 某次研究中心的爆炸事故发生时，一棵芦苇刚好被闪电击中，于是他变成了闪电芦苇；而与此同时，正在操作机枪的豌豆射手也被击中，这就是我们全新的超级英雄————机枪豌豆的来历。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots peas forward and backward
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 向身前和身后发射豌豆

Introduction.en: Split Peas shoot peas forward and backwards.
Introduction.zh: 裂荚射手向前后方发射豌豆。

DESCRIPTION.zh: 向前方正常，向后方两倍

Chat.en: "It's my turn with the eyebrows," said Frontie. "Fine, we'll split them," said Backie. Sprouted two minutes apart, their eyebrow war is eternal.
Chat.zh: “该让我戴眉毛了！”前面的头说道。“好吧，那我们平分一下。”后面的头回答道。只是分开了两分钟，他们的眉毛争夺战就到达了无法停歇的地步。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Zombies that eat it are defeated and release gas
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 僵尸吃下后死亡并释放眩晕气体

Introduction.en: Chili Beans deliver a crippling bout of gastrointestinal distress.
Introduction.zh: 巴豆会对吞食他的敌人施加致命的毒素攻击，并使其释放眩晕气体。

DESCRIPTION.en: eating zombie is destroyed and releases stunning gas
DESCRIPTION.zh: 吃掉他的僵尸直接死亡，并且释放眩晕气体

Chat.en: He's not blushing, he's trying to hold it in.
Chat.zh: 他不是脸红了，而是一直在憋着什么。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Heavy-duty wall that blocks low flying zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 血量更高的坚果墙，可以抵挡飞来的僵尸

Introduction.en: Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that block low flying zombies.
Introduction.zh: 高坚果是血量更厚的坚果墙，可以抵挡低空飞行的僵尸。

Chat.en: Tall-nut is opening a chain of stores for Tall and Taller gentlemen. "I'll shell out the savings to you!"
Chat.zh: 高坚果打算为高个子的绅士们开张连锁店，“我会把我的存货特价卖给大家！”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Blows a chilling wind that pushes back zombies in lane
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 吹出强寒风，推动本行的僵尸

Introduction.en: Hurrikales push back all zombies in their lane with a chilling wind.
Introduction.zh: 飓风甘蓝利用强风将本行所有的僵尸向后推。

DESCRIPTION.zh: 对吹到的僵尸施加冷冻效果

DESCRIPTION.en: blows away flying zombies in lane
DESCRIPTION.zh: 吹飞本行所有的飞行僵尸

Chat.en: You could say Hurrikale is a "blow hard" in the truest sense of the phrase. He is the first chair trombonist in the Biennial Philharmonic Orchestra. He is also proficient in the trumpet, saxophone and the tuba. But man o' man, you should really see him on the flugelhorn. Dude absolutely kills it.
Chat.zh: 用“吹牛大师”形容飓风甘蓝再合适不过了，当然是字面意义上的。他在两年一次的交响乐演奏会上可是首席吹号手。他也精通小号、萨克斯、大号。但是最令人震撼的是他会吹粗管短号！这家伙真是酷毙了。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Slows zombies in nearby lanes
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 减慢范围内的所有僵尸

Introduction.en: Stallias slow down zombies with a puff of perfume.
Introduction.zh: 眩晕雏菊利用一股毒气减慢僵尸的前进。

DESCRIPTION.en: single use, activates when zombie is close
DESCRIPTION.zh: 一次性使用，僵尸靠近时触发
对附近的僵尸施加减速效果

Chat.en: "Life moves too quickly in our modern world," says Stallia. "Folks need to slow down and smell some spores."
Chat.zh: “现在大家都总是忙忙碌碌的，”眩晕雏菊说，“人们应该时不时停下脚步闻闻花香。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Fires electric peas
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 发射电能豌豆子弹

Introduction.en: Electric Peashooters fire pea-like orbs that pass through zombies and crackle with electrical power, doing damage all the while.
Introduction.zh: 电能豌豆向僵尸发射穿透性球状闪电，并且伴随着电弧产生，对附近的目标造成伤害。

Chat.en: Electric Peashooter expects resistance, but he doesn't want to ohm anybody.
Chat.zh: 电能豌豆希望遇到一个电阻相当的对手，但是他又不想跟他们一起算欧姆定律。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Squashed zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 碾压一群僵尸

Introduction.en: Squashes will smash the first zombie that gets close.
Introduction.zh: 倭瓜会砸向第一只向他靠近的僵尸。

Chat.en: Squash is actually his stage name. His birth name was Tracy.
Chat.zh: “倭瓜”其实是他的艺名，他的本名其实是“特雷西”。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Damages all zombies in a 3x3 area
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 对 3x3 范围内所有僵尸造成伤害

Introduction.en: Gloom Shrooms shoot zombie-damaging gloom in eight directions. When powered and shooting, they power near by shadow plants.
Introduction.zh: 忧郁菇向八个方向发射孢子，对僵尸造成伤害。在发射时如果被激活，也会激活附近的暗影植物。

DESCRIPTION.en: powers shadow plants in an area when shooting
DESCRIPTION.zh: 攻击时激活范围内的暗影植物

Chat.en: Some see him as depressed, but he's got a lot of sides.
Chat.zh: 很多人觉得他很忧郁，但实际上他有很多副面孔。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Tap to spend sun for a powerful attack
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 点击后，花费阳光发射光能子弹

Introduction.en: Magnifying Grass turns sun into a bolt of colorful damage.
Introduction.zh: 棱镜草将阳光转换为高能的彩虹子弹。

DESCRIPTION.en: tap to spend sun for an attack

Chat.en: Magnifying Grass understands the inherent power of a rainbow. Beneath her stoic features she takes great joy in delivering radiant multicolored destruction to the zombie horde.
Chat.zh: 棱镜草知道如何运用隐藏在彩虹中的无穷能量。在她冷峻的面孔下，驱动五彩缤纷的辐射对抗僵尸大军使她获得巨大的享受与满足。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Pops up and bashes zombies from behind
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 身后有僵尸时冒出并造成伤害

Introduction.en: Celery Stalkers wait until zombies pass, then pop up and bash them from behind.
Introduction.zh: 潜伏芹菜会等待僵尸走过，在他们走到身后时冒出并抽打他们。

Chat.en: Celery Stalker resents the implication that there's anything unsavory about his attack style. He simply believes that discretion is the better part of vegetation.
Chat.zh: 潜伏芹菜非常讨厌别人说他的攻击方式没特色。他觉得保持低调对植物来说更重要。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Creates zombies-slowing puddles of sap
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 投掷释放树脂的子弹，使僵尸减速

Introduction.en: Sap-flings create zombie-slowing puddles of sap.
Introduction.zh: 树脂投手会在地上留下能让僵尸减速的树脂。

DESCRIPTION.en: does no damage on impact, but create sap puddle
DESCRIPTION.zh: 不会造成伤害，但是子弹爆裂时在地上留下树脂

DESCRIPTION.en: slows zombies who walk in puddle
DESCRIPTION.zh: 走在树脂上的僵尸会被减速

Chat.en: You've gotta see Sap-fling's throwing arm to believe it. He may be young, but everyone agrees ... the kid's got TALENT. Scouts from some of the biggest Pinecone Ball teams have been keeping a close eye on him. He could be headed to the majors. Oh sure, some knock him for his incredibly sticky spitball. But he only uses all-natural sap, so it's entirely legal.
Chat.zh: 不看树脂投手的手臂都不会觉得他年轻而且有不可否认的才华。一些知名的的 Pinecone Ball 球队的球探一直在密切关注他。他可能会去参加大满贯赛。哦，当然，有些人因为他老是丢出黏糊糊的球而觉得他在作弊。但他只使用全天然的汁液，所以这是完全合法的。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Snips zombies, than charges down lane
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 夹击僵尸，被啃咬时冲出并攻击前方所有僵尸

Introduction.en: Parsnips snip at zombies, then charge down the lane at the last moment.
Introduction.zh: 防风草掐伤身前的僵尸，被啃咬后冲出夹击本行前方的僵尸

DESCRIPTION.en: charges down the the lane when defeated and snips zombies in front
DESCRIPTION.zh: 被啃食完毕后沿着本行冲出，掐前方的僵尸

Chat.en: "Snip!" said Parsnip. "Snip snip snip! If it wasn't for my scrapbook, my coupons, and snipping zombies to death, I just don't know what I'd do with myself!"
Chat.zh: “我掐！”防风草叫道。“我掐我掐我掐！要不是为了制作我的剪贴簿、抢我的优惠券，还有掐死僵尸，我都不知道拿自己怎么办！”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Explodes when eaten
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 被啃食后爆炸

Introduction.en: Explode-O-Nuts provide protection, and when their shells are eaten, they explode to blow up zombies.
Introduction.zh: 爆炸坚果保护身后的植物，当他们被吃掉时，炸死周围的僵尸。

Chat.en: "My only regret," says Explode-O-Nut, "is that I have but one chewy center full of nitroglycerin to give in defense of this lawn."
Chat.zh: “唯一令我遗憾的是，”爆炸坚果说道，“我只有一颗能被咬爆的硝酸甘油核心。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Explodes and scatters bouncing projectiles
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 爆炸并发射弹射子弹

Introduction.en: Grapeshots explode and scatter bouncing projectiles in eight directions.
Introduction.zh: 爆裂葡萄爆炸后向 8 个方向发射弹性葡萄子弹。

Chat.en: "Spa-BOOM!" enthuses Grapeshot. "You liked that? I got a million of 'em! Wa-POW! Buh-BLAM! Za-... um... Ker-... hmmm... Okay, I guess I've only got the three."
Chat.zh: “唏——啪——！”爆裂葡萄激情地吼道。“你喜欢吗？我还有上万种这样的声音呢。哇——噗——！啪——砰——！咂——……！额……，轰——……！嗯嗯……，好吧，我想就这三种了。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Removes fog and reveals invisible zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 驱散迷雾，并显示隐形的僵尸

Introduction.en: Planterns remove fog and reveal invisible zombies.
Introduction.zh: 路灯花会驱散迷雾，并使隐形的僵尸显现。

DESCRIPTION.en: when Plant Fooded, gives each zombie 25 sun and hides nearby plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 施加叶绿素后，为场上所有僵尸施予 25 阳光，并使周围的植物隐身

Chat.en: Plantern does his job according to his past experience, "Why not do the same thing as what zombies did in the past?"
Chat.zh: 路灯花根据以往的工作经验恪尽职守，“僵尸以前也喜欢隐藏他们自己，难道我们不能也这么干嘛。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Heals plants in a 3x3 area
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 治疗 3x3 范围内的植物

Introduction.en: Heavenly Peaches heal all surrounding plants, regaining their health.
Introduction.zh: 仙桃医治周围的植物，恢复他们的生命值。

Chat.en: Her resume says that she was once a peach of Wangmu Niangniang for consumption, and became a medic after being demoted to mortal.
Chat.zh: 仙桃的简历上写着白己本是王母娘娘的御用幡桃, 被贬下凡后做了战地医生。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Fires jets of flame over a short distance
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 短距离内喷射火焰攻击

Introduction.en: Jack O' Lanterns spray fire down a lane, doing extensive burning damage over a short distance.
Introduction.zh: 杰克南瓜向本行前方喷射火焰，对短距离内的敌人造成灼烧伤害。

Chat.en: "Boo! Mwah-ha-ha-haaaaah," opines Jack O' Lantern. Oh, yes. Things and stuff are scheduled to be seriously spooky when he's around. Count on it.
Chat.zh: “唔！！！呜哈哈哈！”杰克南瓜又开始吓大家。是的，当他在身边的时候，你就应该时刻做好被惊吓的准备了。好好期待一下吧。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Attacks multiple lanes, one lane at a time
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 攻击邻近行的僵尸

Introduction.en: Dandelions send explosive seeds down three different lanes, one lane at a time.
Introduction.zh: 蒲公英向身前的三行中的一行发射爆炸性蒲公英子弹。

DESCRIPTION.en: can attack targets in the lane above or below
DESCRIPTION.zh: 可以打击上下行和本行的目标

DESCRIPTION.en: may react to certain strong winds
DESCRIPTION.zh: 吹风时有机会作出反应

Chat.en: "Look," says Dandelion, shaking his head, "I'm not a leprechaun and I'm not a genie. You can blow my seeds off all you want, but I can't make your wish come true. I don't even know how that rumor got started."
Chat.zh: “看，”蒲公英摇摇头说，“我才不是什么小妖精或者小精灵。要是想的话，你还可以把我的种子都吹飞，但是我就是不能实现你的愿望。我也不知道这些传闻是谁发起的。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Blocks and hurls zombies backwards
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 阻挡并击退僵尸

Introduction.en: Chard Guards are defensive blockers that can hurl zombies backwards.
Introduction.zh: 甜菜护卫利用坚韧的身躯和菜叶将僵尸击退。

Chat.en: You might remember Chard Guard from his days in the WWF (that's World Wrestling Foliage). When he was in the ring - boy-oh-boy - he was something to behold! His moves! His style! His attitude! The crowd loved him. He was quite the star for a while there. Sure, those days are behind him. But if you watch carefully, when Chard Guard is fighting zombies, you'll see him use the wrestling move he made famous. The ol' Knock 'Em Dead maneuver - it gets 'em every time.
Chat.zh: 你也许还记得WWF里（世界蔬叶摔角大赛）甜菜护卫的闪光时刻。当时他获得“男仔中的男仔”金腰带，那真的是嗨翻全场，万众瞩目！他的动作！他的战风！他的气势！大家爱死他了。那个时候他确实是人气明星。当然，那也已经是之前的事情了。但是如今如果你仔细观察，当甜菜护卫和僵尸战斗的时候，你会看到他使用的正是看家招式————摔跤动作。称之为“一击入魂”的秘技……真是百用百中。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Makes a zombie fight for you
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 让一名僵尸为你战斗

Introduction.en: When zombies eat Hypno-shrooms, they will turn around and fight for you.
Introduction.zh: 当僵尸吃掉了魅惑菇，他们将会转身为你战斗。

DESCRIPTION.en: can't be eaten by chickens or weasels

Chat.en: Hypno-shroom has no trouble persuading zombies to fight on behalf of the plants. But he has yet to convince one to cluck like a chicken. "One day," he says. "One day."
Chat.zh: 魅惑菇很擅长洗脑僵尸作为一个植物去战斗。但是他还没做到说服谁去学鸡叫。“总有一天会的，”他解释道，“总有一天。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Creates electric fences
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 链接电弧对僵尸造成伤害

Introduction.en: Electric Currants create electrical fences between ones planted on the same row or column.
Introduction.zh: 相同行或列的电流醋栗之间会产生电流线。

DESCRIPTION.en: knocks zombies back into other lanes when defeated
DESCRIPTION.zh: 被打败时把僵尸击退至其他行

Chat.en: "Electricity is all very well and fine as a phenomenon," says Electric Currant, "but electromagnetism as a whole is where it's really at."
Chat.zh: “闪电永远是最棒的自然现象，”电流醋栗说道，“但是电磁学这个整体才是它的灵魂所在。”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Explodes and can be swapped with other plants
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 能与其他植物换位，遇到僵尸时爆炸

Introduction.en: Escape Roots explode on contact, and can be swapped with other plants that are in danger.
Introduction.zh: 逃脱树根在接触敌人时爆炸，他可以和其他处境危险的植物交换位置。

DESCRIPTION.en: tap Escape Root and another plant to swap them
DESCRIPTION.zh: 点击逃脱树根后，再点击另一株植物来交换位置

Chat.en: The other plants put on a big surprise party for Escape Root last week, but he did his thing and suddenly it was a surprise party...FOR THEM!
Chat.zh: 上个星期其他植物为逃脱树根举办了一个盛大的惊喜派对，逃脱树根开始玩起了他最擅长的事情，派对的惊喜一下就转移给了大家。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Lets you have two of the same plant
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 允许你同时选取两张相同的卡片

Introduction.en: Imitaters let you use two of the same plant during a level!
Introduction.zh: 变身茄子允许你同一个关卡携带两张相同的植物卡片！

DESCRIPTION.en: can imitate any other non-mint plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 可以模仿其他非薄荷类植物

Chat.en: Having studied French Theater at Julienne, the Imitater went to the streets with his art, and has perfected his technique he calls "Potato stuck in a box".
Chat.zh: 变身茄子在法国进修过表演艺术，在街头表演中完善了他的最新节目“关在盒子里的茄子”。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Poisons zombies over time
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 使僵尸获得一段时间的中毒效果

Introduction.en: Shadow-shrooms poison zombies who touch them, inflicting damage over time.
Introduction.zh: 毒影菇接触到僵尸时，对其施加毒性效果，中毒僵尸一段时间内持续受到伤害。

DESCRIPTION.en: powered Shadow-shrooms make poisoned zombies poison other zombies
DESCRIPTION.zh: 暗影状态下，使僵尸身上的毒有传染性

Chat.en: Despite being such a poisonous and profoundly inedible fungus, Shadow-shroom is nonetheless a total cutie-pie.
Chat.zh: 尽管毒影菇是一种有毒且不容易食用的真菌，但他仍然是一道美味的食物。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Removes helmets and other metal objects from zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 吸走僵尸身上的金属盔甲和其他金属物品

Introduction.en: Magnet-shrooms remove helmets and other metal objects from zombies.
Introduction.zh: 磁力菇会吸走僵尸的金属盔甲和其他金属物品。

DESCRIPTION.zh: 吸走僵尸身上的金属物品

Chat.en: Despite his unusual appearance, Magnet-shroom doesn't have a problem attracting girlfriends. But he does have a problem keeping them. It's the same thing every time. In the end, they always find him too clingy.
Chat.zh: 虽然磁力菇外形奇特，但是对找女朋友完全没有影响。可真谈了恋爱却都维持不长，每个姑娘都因为同一个理由和他分手：他太粘人了！

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Stands firm and resists the magic from Qigong Zombies and Black Holes' suction
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 稳固地立在地上，抵抗气功僵尸的法术和时空黑洞的吞噬

Introduction.en: Resistant Radish stands firm and resists the magic from Qigong Zombies and Black Holes' suction.
Introduction.zh: 白萝卜稳固地立在地上，抵抗气功僵尸的法术和时空黑洞的吞噬。

DESCRIPTION.zh: 防止身后植物被法术抽吸

Chat.en: Resistant Radish has studied qigong for many years, but he only learned one thing: stasis.
Chat.zh: 白萝卜学了很多年气功, 但他一直都只会一招: 纹丝不动。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Disables all machines in an area
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 使范围内所有的机械僵尸陷入故障

Introduction.en: E.M.Peaches explode and disable all machines in an area.
Introduction.zh: 脉冲黄桃爆炸后使范围内的所有机器陷入故障。

Chat.en: E.M.Peach has grown tired of people lazily calling him E.M.Pea. "There's a C and H there for a reason people! And I've got the stone to prove it!"
Chat.zh: 脉冲黄桃逐渐厌烦别人将他简称为“脉冲”。“我的名字里有‘黄桃’两字是有原因的好吗？而且这根本显而易见！”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots powerful balls of plasma
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 发射高能的等离子子弹

Introduction.en: Citrons shoot powerful balls of plasma.
Introduction.zh: 充能柚子向敌人发射高能的等离子子弹。

Chat.en: As the owner and primary user of "Vitamin C-U-Later" 20-hour energy shots, Citron is always on and always ready for action. "Let's make this happen!!"
Chat.zh: 作为“再会，维生素”能量饮料的发明者和首位品尝者，充能柚子始终保持着精神，并时刻准备行动。“那就再来点维生素！！”

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Shoots a laser that pierces through zombies
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 发射穿透僵尸的激光

Introduction.en: Laser Beans fire down a lane, hitting all zombies ahead of it.
Introduction.zh: 激光豆向整条路线发射，打击他前面的所有僵尸。

Chat.en: After a laser eye surgery had gone horribly right, Laser Bean gained a sense of purpose and a new-found affinity for competitive staring contests.
Chat.zh: 经过了激光眼科手术后，他获得了不可思议的能力。现在激光豆拥有了强大的能量，以及不眨眼游戏中的压倒性实力。

BRIEFINTRODUCTION.en: Stuns zombies into dropping suns
BRIEFINTRODUCTION.zh: 令僵尸眩晕，并使之掉落阳光

Introduction.en: Solar Tomatoes stun zombies in a 3x3 area, causing each zombie to drop 50 sun.
Introduction.zh: 阳光番茄使 3x3 范围内僵尸眩晕，并使每只僵尸掉落 50 阳光。

Chat.en:
Solar Tomato wishes folks would just stop and enjoy the sunshine sometimes.
"Stop," she says. "Enjoy the sunshine. I said stop! Hold it right there! Don't move! I MEAN IT!!!"
Chat.zh:
阳光番茄希望忙碌的人们时常停下来享受阳光。
“停下！”她叫嚷道，“享受一下阳光！我说了给我停下来！不许动！别动！我认真的！！！”。
